_source.text: Acti-Blizz CEO Bobby Kotick pointed to titles such as Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare , Guitar Hero: Aerosmith , Guitar Hero: On Tour , World of Warcraft and Star Wars: The Force Unleashed - which it published outside of North America - for the better than expected quarter.
